subject: [bad] Amazon.com equate posting notices with sending communication
text:
"... or by posting notices on this site or through the other Amazon Services. You agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures and other communications that we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing."
https://github.com/tosdr/tosback2/blob/265e49bf24a91076495ce1fddf279c4638421a66/crawl/amazon.com/Conditions%20of%20Use.txt#L24

this can be interpreted as posting notices on their site would be a sufficient communication, for instance in case of a unilateral change of contract. unless this is contradicted elsewhere, this would entitle them to consider all users notified without actually sending these users a pro-active message.
